title: Ground Zero (1987 - Australia) atomic conspiracy action
description:
Ground Zero (1987 - Australia)

Action / Drama / Mystery
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0093120/


4 Award WINS and 6 Award NOMINATIONS

Filmed at Coober Pedy and Woomera, South Australia, Australia

Prompted by curiosity about some old film footage taken by his father, a cinematographer embarks on a quest to find out the truth about British nuclear tests at Maralinga.

In the 1950s, the British government had conducted a number of nuclear tests at a site called Maralinga in outback South Australia. It was subsequently alleged that during those tests, armed forces personnel and Indigenous Australians may have been exposed to nuclear fallout that may have affected their health. This led eventually to a major inquiry which attracted a lot of publicity, and ultimately a deal was struck with the United Kingdom to fund rehabilitation of the test site. Ground Zero was made immediately following this inquiry.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 718x434, 25.000 fps, 1839 Kbps, 01h36m12s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
